coreAtributes.authorTag: A tag sewn into the inside of the back reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: heavy plate carrier
coreAtributes.description: A standard plate carrier vest fitted with additional deltoid, groin, neck, and throat protection. It is intended for use in pitched battles rather than quick raids.

sticker.descriptionModification: This one is clearly labeled for Enforcer use.
sticker.unavailabilityText: #IF(!pc.hasOccupationTag(OCCUPATION_TAG_ENFORCER_PATROL) || !pc.hasOccupationTag(OCCUPATION_TAG_ENFORCER_SWORD) || !pc.hasOccupationTag(OCCUPATION_TAG_ENFORCER_ORICL)) Only Enforcers can use an Enforcer branchtape! #ENDIF
sticker.availabilityText: As an Enforcer, you can freely use Enforcer branchtapes.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] head through the plate carrier's neck hole and [npc.verb(secure)] the cummerbund on either side of [npc.her] torso.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.namePos] head through the plate carrier's neck hole and [npc.verb(secure)] the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.her] torso.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shove)] [npc2.namePos] head through the plate carrier's neck hole and hastily [npc.verb(secure)] the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] un[npc.do] the cummerbund on either side of [npc.her] plate carrier, [npc.verb(withdraw)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and [npc.verb(slide)] [npc.her] head through the neck hole.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] un[npc.do] the cummerbund on either side of [npc2.name] plate carrier, [npc.verb(guide)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and [npc.verb(slide)] [npc2.her] head through the neck hole.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(rip)] open the cummerbund either side of [npc2.namePos] plate carrier, [npc.verb(force)] [npc.her] [npc.arms] from the deltoid protectors, and [npc.verb(yank)] the rest over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the groin protector on [npc.her] heavy plate carrier back down.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lower)] the groin protector on [npc.her] heavy plate carrier back down.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(flip)] the groin protector on [npc.her] heavy plate carrier back down.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lift)] the groin protector on [npc.her] heavy plate carrier up.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(lift)] the groin protector on [npc2.namePos] heavy plate carrier up.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(flip)] the groin protector on [npc2.namePos] heavy plate carrier up.
